varselforgroenland.name: Warning for Greenlandic seaareas
varselforgroenland.text: There is storm warning for Narsalik and Meqquitsoq. There is gale warning for Kulusuk, Timmiarmiut, Nunap Isuata Kangia, Nunap Isuata Kitaa, Nunarsuit, Attu, Uiffaq, Qimusseriarsuaq and Kiatak. There is risk of ice accretion of Daneborg.

gyldighed.name: Validhoures
gyldighed.text: Forecast, valid to the 29. November 06 UTC. Issued 8.10 UTC.

oversigt.name: Synoptic situation
oversigt.text: A low, 972 hPa, just south of the Baffin Island is moving towards north. Associated front, with rain and locally sleet, over the western waters is moving towards northeast, and followed by of wintry showers. A front with rain over the southeastern waters is almost stationary. Otherwise a few snow showers.

wavesdaneborg.name: Waves Daneborg
wavesdaneborg.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

icedaneborg.name: Ice_Daneborg
icedaneborg.text: Old ice and thin first-year ice in the northern and western part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkangikajik.name: Forecast for Kangikajik
udsigtforkangikajik.text: North 6 to 11 m/s. Very poor visibility. This evening north 2 to 7 m/s. And in southeastern part variable below 5 m/s. Very poor to good visibility. This night north 3 to 8 m/s. Poor visibility.

waveskangikajik.name: Waves Kangikajik
waveskangikajik.text: Significant wave height: 2,5 m. Swells: 2 m.

icekangikajik.name: Ice_Kangikajik
icekangikajik.text: Old ice and thin first-year ice in the western and southern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforaputiteeq.name: Forecast for Aputiteeq
udsigtforaputiteeq.text: Southwest 5 to 10 m/s. And in northwestern part northeast 3 to 8 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon in western part northeast 2 to 7 m/s. And in eastern part west 2 to 7 m/s. Good visibility. This evening west 4 to 9 m/s. Good visibility. This night in southern part southwest 5 to 10 m/s. In northeastern part west 3 to 8 m/s. And in northwestern part variable below 5 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesaputiteeq.name: Waves Aputiteeq
wavesaputiteeq.text: Significant wave height: 2 m. Swells: 2 m.

iceaputiteeq.name: Ice_Aputiteeq
iceaputiteeq.text: Areas of young ice and nilas in the western and northern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkulusuk.name: Forecast for Kulusuk
udsigtforkulusuk.text: Southeast 5 to 10 m/s. And in northwestern part southwest 1 to 6 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon, this evening and this night in western part gale from north 11 to 16 m/s. And in eastern part southeast 6 to 11 m/s. Poor to good visibility.

waveskulusuk.name: Waves Kulusuk
waveskulusuk.text: Significant wave height: 3,5 m. Swells: 2,5 m.

icekulusuk.name: Ice_Kulusuk
icekulusuk.text: Strips and patches of nilas in the westernmost part along the coast. Many icebergs and growlers in the western part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfortimmiarmiut.name: Forecast for Timmiarmiut
udsigtfortimmiarmiut.text: In western part gale from north 13 to 18 m/s. And in eastern part gale from southeast 9 to 14 m/s. Moderate visibility. This night gale from northeast 13 to 18 m/s. And in northwestern part gale from north 12 to 17 m/s. Moderate to good visibility.

wavestimmiarmiut.name: Waves Timmiarmiut
wavestimmiarmiut.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

icetimmiarmiut.name: Ice_Timmiarmiut
icetimmiarmiut.text: Strips and patches of nilas in the westernmost part along the coast. Few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kangia
udsigtfornunapisuatakangia.text: Gale from southeast 10 to 15 m/s. Moderate visibility. Around noon in northern part gale from northeast 9 to 14 m/s. And in southern part south 2 to 7 m/s. Poor to moderate visibility. This evening gale from northeast 9 to 14 m/s. And in southwestern part variable below 5 m/s. Poor to good visibility. This night gale from northeast 9 to 14 m/s. Poor visibility.

waveskangia.name: Waves Nunap Isuata Kangia
waveskangia.text: Significant wave height: 4 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.name: Forecast for Nunap Isuata Kitaa
udsigtfornunapisuatakitaa.text: Gale from east 9 to 14 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon south 6 to 11 m/s. And in northeastern part northeast 7 to 12 m/s. Good visibility. This evening in western part south 3 to 8 m/s. In northeastern part gale from northeast 9 to 14 m/s. And in southeastern part variable below 5 m/s. Good visibility. This night gale from northeast 9 to 14 m/s. Good visibility.

waveskitaa.name: Waves Isuata Kitaa
waveskitaa.text: Significant wave height: 5 m. Swells: 4 m.

udsigtfornunarsuit.name: Forecast for Nunarsuit
udsigtfornunarsuit.text: Gale from southeast 17 to 22 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon, this evening and this night south 8 to 13 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesnunarsuit.name: Waves Nunarsuit
wavesnunarsuit.text: Significant wave height: 6 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtfornarsalik.name: Forecast for Narsalik
udsigtfornarsalik.text: Storm from southeast 20 to 25 m/s. Good visibility. Around noon, this evening and this night gale from south 12 to 17 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesnarsalik.name: Waves Narsalik
wavesnarsalik.text: Significant wave height: 8 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtformeqquitsoq.name: Forecast for Meqquitsoq
udsigtformeqquitsoq.text: Storm from southeast 20 to 25 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesmeqquitsoq.name: Waves Meqquitsoq
wavesmeqquitsoq.text: Significant wave height: 9 m. Swells: 5 m.

udsigtforattu.name: Forecast for Attu
udsigtforattu.text: Gale from south 17 to 22 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesattu.name: Waves Attu
wavesattu.text: Significant wave height: 8 m. Swells: 5 m.

iceattu.name: Ice_Attu
iceattu.text: Young ice and nilas in the western part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforuiffaq.name: Forecast for Uiffaq
udsigtforuiffaq.text: Gale from southeast 16 to 21 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesuiffaq.name: Waves Uiffaq
wavesuiffaq.text: Significant wave height: 7 m. Swells: 5 m.

iceuiffaq.name: Ice_Uiffaq
iceuiffaq.text: Young ice and nilas in the western part. Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.name: Forecast for Qimusseriarsuaq
udsigtforqimusseriarsuaq.text: Gale from southeast 9 to 14 m/s. Poor visibility. This evening gale from south 11 to 16 m/s. Moderate visibility. This night gale from southeast 14 to 19 m/s. And in northeastern part east 5 to 10 m/s. Good visibility.

wavesqimusseriarsuaq.name: Waves Qimusseriarsuaq
wavesqimusseriarsuaq.text: Significant wave height: 6 m. Swells: 3,5 m.

iceqimusseriarsuaq.name: Ice_Qimusseriarsuaq
iceqimusseriarsuaq.text: Thin first-year ice and young ice throughout the area, however areas with open water in the southeastern part. Many icebergs and growlers in the eastern part along the coast, otherwise few icebergs and growlers.

udsigtforkiatak.name: Forecast for Kiatak
udsigtforkiatak.text: Gale from northeast 10 to 15 m/s. Poor visibility.

icekiatak.name: Ice_Kiatak
icekiatak.text: Thin first-year ice and young ice throughout the area. Scattered icebergs and growlers throughout the area.
